home.title: Find Your Music
home.subtitle: Discover millions of songs from YouTube
home.recentlyPlayed: Your recently played tracks will appear here
home.startPlaying: Start playing music to see your history
home.tryAgainLater: Check back soon for fresh trends

search.findFavoriteSongs: Find your favorite songs, artists, or albums from YouTube
search.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong while contacting our music sources.

library.title: Your Library
library.startAdding: Start adding music to see it here
library.requiresAccount: Library access requires an account. Sign in to save playlists and manage your uploaded music.
library.createFirstPlaylist: Create your first playlist to organize your music
library.uploadPersonalMusic: Upload your personal music to stream anywhere
library.downloadMusicFromYouTube: Download music from YouTube to listen offline

upload.title: Upload Music
upload.dragDrop: Drag and drop audio files here, or click to select
upload.supportedFormats: Supported formats: MP3, WAV, FLAC, AAC
upload.requiresAccount: You need an account to upload music.

history.requiresAccount: History access requires an account. Sign in to keep track of your listening history and pick up where you left off.

createPlaylist.requiresAccount: Playlist creation requires an account. Sign in to create playlists.

auth.registrationSuccess: Registration successful! Please check your email for verification.
auth.passwordResetEmailSent: Password reset email sent! Check your inbox.
auth.emailVerified: Email verified successfully! You can now login.
auth.passwordResetSuccess: Password reset successfully! You can now login.
auth.networkError: Network error: Unable to connect to server. Please check if the server is running.

landing.heroSubtitle: Stream millions of songs from YouTube, upload your own tracks, and enjoy seamless playback with real-time lyrics
landing.searchStreamDesc: Access millions of songs from YouTube with instant search and high-quality streaming
landing.uploadMusicDesc: Upload and play your personal music collection alongside YouTube tracks
landing.lyricsDesc: Sing along with synchronized lyrics for your favorite songs
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join now and create your personalized music experience

settings.settingsDescription: Manage your account settings and preferences
settings.privacyDesc: Read our privacy policy to understand how we handle your data
settings.termsDesc: Read our terms of service and user agreement
settings.dataManagementDesc: Manage your listening history and user data
settings.clearHistoryConfirmDesc: This will permanently delete all your listening history. This action cannot be undone.
settings.resetDataDesc: Clear all your data including history, playlists, and uploads
settings.resetDataConfirmDesc: This will permanently delete all your data including listening history, playlists, and uploaded files. This action cannot be undone.
settings.historyClearedDesc: Your listening history has been cleared successfully
settings.historyClearError: Failed to clear history. Please try again.
settings.dataResetDesc: Your data has been reset successfully
settings.resetError: Failed to reset data. Please try again.
